Ru_trainchinese:
xué: (глаг) учить, исследовать; подражать, имитировать
xué: (графема) (суффикс) наука, -логия; школа, учебное заведение; учение, знание
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In the schoolhouse there are kids always studying.
origin_of_ch_char_book: A long time ago, there were various types of divinations in the East, and people used a variety of tools for them. (敎, 教, jiao, teach) is combination of four sticks crossed with each other , and a child, hand holding a rod for spanking. This scene shows someone teaching divination using four sticks. Each stick has two sides (front and back) which can make different formations when people throw them on the ground, and fortunes are told depending on their arrangements. (學, 学, xue=hsüueh, study) Also, in this word, you can see two hands holding something and four sticks to tell fortunes . Add the symbol for ‘six’ (六, liu, six) which means the number of Changes, or Universe, and a child. All combined, the word shows a scene of a person learning how to tell fortunes by using sticks. This kind of tradition still remains in some parts of Koreans and native Americans. The process of this divination was complex, and people had to learn (學, 学, xue, study) or teach (敎, 教, jiao, teach) the way to practice.,A Korean traditional game playing with four sticks originated in fortunetelling of the year. The author’s thesis demonstrating that this game is closely related to 學 (学, xue, study) was accepted in Chinese University (2013). Some American natives also have such a game. (算, suan, calculate) Here we see a bamboo tree above, an abacus in the middle, and two hands on the bottom. It describes a person calculating with an abacus that is made of a bamboo.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle from " 𦥑 " (like hands) from " five " to " six ", or not from " five " but from "爻" sound. Knowing how to use both hands to make plans, count, or fortune-telling, the inscription adds to the " zi ", because learning and education are related to children (Shen Pei). Will teach children the meaning of mathematics.

Since giver to teach, to learn from the recipient (Season Sunrise), the ancient Chinese Shi often subject to the same speech, such as " by " acceptance can also be expressed awarded. Therefore, " learning ", " mingling " and " teaching " can mean both teaching and learning knowledge. Adding the word "攴" like a pointer to the right of " learning " means the word "斅" for professors. " Learning ", "斅", and "教" are all similar in form, sound and meaning, and are cognate words, so Lin Yiguang believes that the ancient " " Teach " and " learn " are the same word. See " teaching ".

It is said that the word " learning " from "爻" from "宀" (house), like a building with "thousand trees" (crossed wooden poles) on the roof, refers to a school. The Chiki-style architecture still remains in Japanese shrine architecture, which shows that it belongs to a kind of sacred architecture, and the children of ancient nobles must receive education here (Shirakawa Jing). Sacrifice in the "University" according to the Oracle records can be used as evidence.

The oracle bone inscriptions were used as names and original meanings. There were universities in the Yin dynasty. Tunnan 60: "xun in the university", " xun " is the name of the sacrifice, which means that the search ceremony was held in the university. Pre-Qin University is an important place for teaching and military training. "poetry. Zhou Song. "Jingzhi": "The sun will be the moon, and you will learn to have Ji Xi in the light."

Bronze inscriptions are also used as the original meaning, Da Yu Ding: "Yu Wei is Zhen Primary School" "Book of Rites. "The King System": "The primary school is to the south of the Gonggong, and the university is in the suburbs." Zheng Xuan's note: "This elementary school, the university is the system of Yin." "Da Dai Li Ji. Bao Fu": "When the prince is young and lustful, he enters elementary school." Lu Bian's note: "The ancient prince entered elementary school at the age of eight, and he also entered Taixue at the age of 15." He also said that the professor, Jing Xi: "Wang Lingjing 𤔲Shootology In the palace, the kid, the servant, the corpse (barbarian) learns to shoot.... Jingxue is not stunned, Wang Yi (gives) quiet...", indicating that Wang ordered Jing to preside over the archery practice in the academy. Learn to archery. Professor Jing shot arrows without fault, and was rewarded by King Zhou. "Study Palace" is the school of ancient princes and nobles, which can also be found in the handed down document, "The Biography of Ancient Lies. Mother Yi Biography. "Zou Mengke Mu": "Besides the Palace of Returning to School".

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period were also used as the original meaning, "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Slips. "The Eighteen Kinds of Laws of the Qin Dynasty", Jian 112: "Successful Learning" means the completion of studies.

The Han bamboo slips are called " jue ", which means feeling, "Zhangjiashan Han Slips. "Citations": "Students (feeling) those who have pain in their confidant and Hun (chest), there is no hand (to caress)".

"Shu Wen": "Chen, enlightenment. From the teaching to the 冂. The 冂, the Meng is also. The sound. The study, the seal script is simple."
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle " learning " means teaching children to play with their hands and count in order to learn mathematics. The original meaning is learning.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「𦥑」(象雙手)從「五」從「六」，或不從「五」而從「爻」聲。會雙手擺弄籌策計數或算卦，金文加從「子」，因為學習和教育都與孩子有關 (沈培)。會教孩子學習數學之意。

　　自施者為教，自受者為學(季旭昇)，古漢語往往施受同辭，如「受」既可表示接受，也可表示授予。故「學」、「斅」、「教」可同時表示教授和學習知識。在「學」右邊加上象教鞭的「攴」，是表示教授的「斅」字，「學」、「斅」、「教」形音義皆近，是同源詞，故林義光認為古「教」、「學」同字。參見「教」。

　　一說「學」字從「爻」從「宀」(房屋)，象屋頂上搭有「千木」(交叉的木杆)的建築物，指代學舍。千木式建築方式仍殘存於日本的神社建築中，可見其屬於一種神聖的建築，古代貴族子弟要在這裏接受教育(白川靜)。按甲骨文記載在「大學」裏進行祭祀，可以為證。

　　甲骨文用作人名，又用作本義，殷代已有大學，《屯南》60：「于大學尋」，「尋」是祭名，表示在大學舉行尋祭。先秦大學為教學和進行軍事訓練的重要場所。《詩．周頌．敬之》：「日就月將，學有緝熙于光明。」

　　金文也用作本義，大盂鼎：「余唯即朕小學」《禮記．王制》：「小學在公宮南之左，大學在郊。」鄭玄注：「此小學、大學殷之制。」《大戴禮記．保傅》：「及太子少長，知好色，則入于小學。」盧辯注：「古者太子八歲入小學，十五歲入太學也。」又表示教授，靜簋：「王令靜𤔲射學宮，小子眔小臣眔尸(夷)僕學射。……靜學無愍，王易(賜)靜……」，表示王命令靜在學宮主持射箭練習，小子、小臣、夷僕學習射箭。靜教授射箭，沒有過失，得到周王的賞賜。「學宮」是古代王公貴族的學校，亦見於傳世文獻，《古列女傳．母儀傳．鄒孟軻母》：「復徙舍學宮之傍」。

　　戰國竹簡亦用作本義，《睡虎地秦簡．秦律十八種》簡112：「成學」，表示完成學業。

　　漢簡通假為「覺」，表示感覺，《張家山漢簡．引書》：「學(覺)心腹及匈(胸)中有痛者，無(撫)之以手」。

　　《說文》：「斆，覺悟也。從教從冂。冂，尚矇也。臼聲。學，篆文斆省。」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文「學」表示教孩子雙手擺弄籌策計數，以學習數學，本義是學習。

English Definition: to learn; to study; to imitate; science; -ology
Antonyms: 教

Ideographic: A building 冖 where children 子 study

More: 學* | *學 | *學*

学学RS 學 learning, knowledge, school
  • a child 子 learns 龸; also 學
 覚 博 教 懲 修 習; 業 科
(Simplified: 学)
Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 教
Ideographic: A building 冖 where children 子 study
  • ⿳ Above to middle and below
    • 冖 [ mì ] cover
    • 子 [ zi ] son, child; seed, egg; fruit; small thing
①效法，鑽研知識，獲得知識，讀書：學生。學徒。學習。學業。學友。學者。學閥。學制。學歷。學步邯鄲(譏諷人只知模仿，不善於學而無成就，亦作“邯鄲學步”)。
②傳授知識的地方：學校(簡稱“學”或“校”)。學院。學府。中學。大學。上學。
③掌握的知識：學問(簡稱“學”)。學術(一切學問的總稱)。學位。學士(ａ．學位名，大學畢業生；b．古代官名)。才學。治學。學識。博學多才。
④分門別類的有系統的知識：學說。哲學。數學。小學(ａ．古代指文學、音韻、訓詁學；b．現指初等學校)。

學字的基本解释

學
xué
见“学”。

學字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xué］
［《廣韻》胡覺切，入覺，匣。］
亦作“斈1”。“学1”的繁体字。
(1)学习。
(2)学习的人。
(3)效法，模仿。
(4)描画；书写。
(5)如，象。
(6)学校。
(7)学科。
(8)学问。
(9)学说。
(10)学派。
(11)注释阐述。
(12)述说，诉说。
(13)通“鷽”。参见“學鳩”。
(14)通“礐”。参见“學學”。
[②]［xiào］
［《集韻》後教切，去效，匣。］
同“斆1”。亦作“斈2”。“学2”的繁体字。
教导。

學字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【子字部】　學； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页280第28
【唐韻】胡覺切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】轄覺切，?音鷽。【說文】覺悟也，本作斆，篆作學。【增韻】受敎傳業曰學。朱子曰：學之爲言效也。【詩·周頌】日就月將，學有緝熙于光明。【書·說命】王人求多聞，時惟建事。學于古訓，乃有獲。【禮·學記】君子之於學也，藏焉，修焉，息焉，游焉，夫然故安其學而親其師，樂其友而信其道。　又學校，庠序總名。【禮·王制】天子命之敎，然後爲學。小學在公宮南之左，大學在郊，天子曰辟雍，諸侯曰頖宮。　又姓。見【姓苑】。　又叶許旣切，音戲。【前漢·匡張孔馬敘傳】樂安裒裒，古之文學。叶下司，司音細。　又叶後敎切，音效。【傅毅·廸志詩】訓我嘉務，惠我博學。叶上誥。　【正字通】與斆別。○按《書·說命》惟斆學半。學與斆別。諸家泥經傳，斆或作學，合學斆爲一，非。今斆音效，而學校字但作學，互詳攴部斆字註。
